content:
You quickly move in and grab the figure, catching them off guard. You yank off their mask, revealing the face of Maric, the follower of Selune who you met at the temple. He has a shocked and startled expression on his face, his eyes wide with surprise and fear.

It looks like Maric is the thief, but you are not sure of his motives yet. You could question him or tie him up and call the guards or you could let him go and follow him to see where he is going.

What would you like to do now?
